hero.description: I build things for the web and I'm currently looking for a new challenge to relocate myself in the job market!

about.title: About
about.paragraphOne: Hello! My name is Lucas and I like to create visual things. My interest in web development began in 2018 when I enrolled in college to study Systems Analysis and Development. During the course, I was exposed to programming logic, data structures, web development, and other subjects, and I became increasingly interested in the field.
about.paragraphTwo: I had the privilege of working at a software solutions company that served a government entity, a logistics company, and a multinational IT services company that also served a government entity.
about.paragraphThree: Here are some technologies I have been working with:

sgm.title: Software Developer
sgm.descriptionOne: Responsible for designing the front-end architecture of MVPs with multi-tenancy (SaaS) support, ensuring scalability and maintainability from the ground up.
sgm.descriptionTwo: Developed modern and responsive user interfaces using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, and TypeScript, with a strong focus on performance and accessibility.
sgm.descriptionThree: Integrated Laravel REST APIs, handling authentication flows, loading states, and error management using TanStack Query.
sgm.descriptionFour: Implemented real-time communication features via WebSockets, enhancing user interaction and responsiveness.
sgm.descriptionFive: Managed cloud file uploads and access using Amazon S3, including permission control and performance optimization.
sgm.descriptionSix: Contributed to the maintenance and improvement of legacy systems, performing refactoring, bug fixing, and ongoing enhancements based on best development practices.
sgm.descriptionSeven: Collaborated with teamworks to continuously deliver and iterate features within agile workflows.

freelance.title: Freelancer
freelance.descriptionOne: Responsible for developing and maintaining a financial product's front-end from end to end, ensuring responsiveness, performance, and clean architecture.
freelance.descriptionTwo: Building interfaces with React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, React Hook Form, Zod, and TanStack Query.
freelance.descriptionThree: Integrating with a back-end powered by Laravel and Inertia.js, enabling a seamless full-stack experience.
freelance.descriptionFour: Applying clean code principles, reusable component patterns, and scalable structure aligned with best front-end practices.
freelance.descriptionFive: Participating in architectural and UI/UX decisions, contributing to the creation and maintenance of a custom design system.
freelance.descriptionSix: Ensuring high code quality, accessibility standards, and consistent UI behavior across multiple devices and screen sizes.

sonda.title: Software Developer 2
sonda.descriptionOne: Developed web applications using React, TypeScript, Tailwind, React Hook Form, and a bit of Laravel on the back-end.
sonda.descriptionTwo: Implemented clean code and refactoring practices, improving maintainability and reducing errors.
sonda.descriptionThree: Participated in SCRUM methodologies, including sprints, planning, and reviews.

jsl.title: Full-stack Developer
jsl.descriptionOne: Developed and maintained the branch's main system using PHP, React, Semantic UI, jQuery, ApexCharts, and other libraries.
jsl.descriptionTwo: Performed analysis, integration, and manipulation of data from external APIs.
jsl.descriptionThree: Managed version control, ensuring development integrity and organization.

vert.title: Junior Systems Analyst
vert.descriptionOne: Developed modern and dynamic interfaces using React and complementary libraries.
vert.descriptionTwo: Updated and optimized existing systems, ensuring performance and usability.
vert.descriptionThree: Performed maintenance and customization of CMS platforms, focusing on Joomla, to meet specific project needs.

whatsnew.title: What's New
whatsnew.description: A news system that allows reading, creating, editing, and deleting articles, organized by teams. Each team manages its members and can invite new ones. Statistics include like rate, views, most popular news, and top contributors.

couplespace.title: Couplespace
couplespace.description: A web app for couples to show their love. Make declarations with words, images, and videos. Log in with your Google account and generate a QR Code for your own page.

bookly.title: Bookly
bookly.description: A general appointment scheduling web app for both consumers and professionals. As a professional, organize and manage your appointments. As a consumer, find professionals, request appointments, and leave reviews.

mumair.title: Mumair Portfolio
mumair.description: A simple portfolio landing page developed to improve my Styled-Components knowledge.

contact.title: What's Next?
contact.paragraph: I'm currently looking for a new opportunity, so my email inbox is always open. If you have any questions or just want to say hi, I'll do my best to answer!
